1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Mu'adh that:A woman asked 'Aishah: "Can a woman who is menstruating, dye her hands?" She said: "We were with the Prophet and we used to dye our hands, and he did not tell us not to do that

chapter.eng-name: A menstruating woman may dye herself
